function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Adopting a centralised infrastructure for data management","Impact":"Risk of single point of failure and data security vulnerabilities","Mitigation":"Implementing robust data security measures, regular audits, and redundancy plans","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption, access controls","People":"Data managers, IT professionals, system administrators","Owner":"IT department, data management team"},{"Description":"Ethical considerations in accessing patient records","Impact":"Risk of breaching patient privacy and data protection regulations","Mitigation":"Obtaining informed consent, anonymizing patient data, and complying with data protection laws","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, data access controls, consent management systems","People":"Research ethics committees, data protection officers, legal experts","Owner":"Research institutions, data management teams"},{"Description":"Lack of standardized reporting for cohort data and international code linkage","Impact":"Risk of data incomparability and interoperability issues","Mitigation":"Implementing data standardization protocols, harmonization procedures, and international code mappings","Technologies":"Data standardization tools, international code mapping systems, data harmonization platforms","People":"Data analysts, health informaticians, standardization experts","Owner":"Health organizations, data management teams"}]}
